00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *out;
00031     long len;
00032  
00033     adfEnvInitDefault();
00034 
00035 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00036 
00037     /* mount existing device : FFS */
00038     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00039     if (!hd) {
00040         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00041         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00042     }
00043 
00044     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00045     if (!vol) {
00046         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00047         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00048         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00052 
00053     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "mod.and.distantcall","r");
00054     if (!file) return 1;
00055     out = fopen("mod.distant","wb");
00056     if (!out) return 1;
00057     
00058     len = 600;
00059     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00060     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00061         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00062         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00063     }
00064     if (n>0)
00065         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00066 
00067     fclose(out);
00068 
00069     adfCloseFile(file);
00070 
00071     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "emptyfile", "r");
00072     if (!file) { 
00073         adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); 
00074         fprintf(stderr, "can't open file\n");
00075         exit(1); 
00076     }
00077  
00078     n = adfReadFile(file, 2, buf);
00079 
00080     adfCloseFile(file);
00081 
00082 
00083     adfUnMount(vol);
00084     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00085 
00086 
00087     /* ofs */
00088 
00089     hd = adfMountDev( argv[2],FALSE );
00090     if (!hd) {
00091         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00092         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00093     }
00094 
00095     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00096     if (!vol) {
00097         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00098         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00099         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00100     }
00101 
00102     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00103 
00104     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon.gif","r");
00105     if (!file) return 1;
00106     out = fopen("moon_gif","wb");
00107     if (!out) return 1;
00108 
00109     len = 300;
00110     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00111     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00112         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00113         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00114     }
00115     if (n>0)
00116         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00117 
00118     fclose(out);
00119 
00120     adfCloseFile(file);
00121 
00122     adfUnMount(vol);
00123     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00124 
00125 
00126     adfEnvCleanUp();
00127 
00128     return 0;
00129 }
